ComicInfo.Summary:
The battle is on as Robyn barely claws her way out of another near-death situation, only to be thrown back into the never-ending turmoil that is her new prison island life. With her enemies finally gaining ground on our hooded archer, she is put to the ultimate test of survival that even Robyn Locksley may not be able to emerge from this time.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Josh George & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Sheldon Goh & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | D | Cover D | Anthony Spay & Grostieta | 4 | E | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | Holiday Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Ceci de la Cruz (c) | Missing |
